channel.title: Factory Skyline poor choice of UI key
channel.description: Hey cepheidqq, you chose "R" as the UI opening key for your mod; that conflicts with the game's default "Reload" key, which is a commonly used key and isn't likely to be rebound by most players. Might want to change that, or maybe make it configurable.

item.title: Factory Skyline poor choice of UI key
item.dc:creator: @Carnaxus Carnaxus
item.description:
@Carnaxus wrote:

Hey cepheidqq, you chose “R” as the UI opening key for your mod; that conflicts with the game’s default “Reload” key, which is a commonly used key and isn’t likely to be rebound by most players. Might want to change that, or maybe make it configurable.

Read full topic
item.source: Factory Skyline poor choice of UI key
